divs: Sighting DetailsI SAW THE SAME UFO MANY THOUSANDS DID IN ARIZONA IN 1997 OR 1998. IT WAS HUGE, V SHAPED WITH FIVE LIGHTS(WHITE) ON UNDERSIDE OF UFO. OF COURSE THE NEXT DAY THE ARIZONA GOVERNMENT MADE A BIG JOKE OF IT. THE GOVERNMENT AS WELL AS THE MILITARY DENIED EVERYTHING. I WATCHED THIS UFO FOR A VERY LONG TIME. IT WAS SCARY. THIS IS NOT THE ONLY UFO I HAVE SEEN IN MY LIFE. I HAVE SEEN MORE AND EACH TIME THERE HAS BEEN OTHER WITNESSES. I WATCHED THIS UFO ALONG WITH THOUSANDS OF OTHER PEOPLE WHO SAW IT. I WAS IN PHOENIX AT THE TIME. WHEN I FIRST SAW IT I KNEW IT WAS A UFO RIGHT AWAY. IT WAS HUGE AND IT MOVED SLOWLY ACROSS THE SKY SO MANY PEOPLE KNEW WHAT THEY WERE LOOKING AT. IT WAS NO AIRPLANE OR ANYTHING LIKE IVE EVER SEEN BEFORE.
Summary: THIS WAS A VERY HUGE UFO SEEN BY THOUSANDS
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around March 7th 1995
